item.caption: Desktop URL
item.comment: If you have Ray Desktop you can specify donwload URL and your users could download Ray Desktop using it.

item.caption: Compose page
item.comment: Tha name of the compose page in your script. You should specify it with the path from the script's root folder.

item.caption: Mailbox
item.comment: Enable mailbox feature. You can enable it only if you have mailbox in your script.

item.caption: Friends
item.comment: Enable friends tab. You can enable it only if you have friends feature in your script.

item.caption: IM
item.comment: Show Invite to IM button in user info when the last one has online status.
